author: amaltaro
body:
This PR provides 3 changes to the `wmagentpy3.spec` file:
* bump WMAgent version to `1.4.9.pre1`
* remove the `condor` dependency temporarily (until we sort the mix of py2 and py3 libraries)
* explicitly build and install the service with a `python3` interpreter. Also fixed the python to be used from the environment.
title: Fix python interpreter to be used in wmagentpy3 spec; temporarily dropping condor
